entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY ENDED, Barry's Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:45 PM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow with risk of freezing drizzle. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 6 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening and risk of freezing drizzle. Clearing this evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023
